name: The Healer Saga
description:
This game was made for Mini Jam 128: Health. I had little time to work on the game and I couldn't finish it the way I wanted, but I wanted to post it anyway.

This is a simple game where you are the healer Dorian and you need to heal your party as they go head-to-head with monsters.

HOW TO PLAY?

Click on the heroes to drop them out of combat and heal them. Prevent them from dying until the monster is defeated.

A game by Róger Goulart (@roger_goulart)
